text: is a bay in the southern Kant≈ç region of Japan. It goes on the coasts of Tokyo, Kanagawa Prefecture, and Chiba Prefecture. The Uraga Channel connects Tokyo Bay to the Pacific Ocean. Its old name was . The Tokyo Bay region is the place with the most people, and it's the place that is most industrialized in Japan. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Geography of Tokyo Category:Bays of Japan
title: Tokyo Bay
